Definition: In this task, you are given a news article. Your task is to classify the article to one out of the four topics 'World', 'Sports', 'Business', 'Sci/Tech'. The article is about something relevant to the world, sports, business, and science/technology if you choose the topics 'World', 'Sports', 'Business', 'Sci/Tech' correspondingly. If you are not sure about the topic, choose the closest option. Note that URLs in the text have been replaced with [Link].
